data.title: Andrew Grose, MD, MSc - Hip and Knee Replacement and Trauma Surgeon
data.meta_description: Dr. Grose is an orthopedic surgeon at HSS specializing in the treatment of fractures of the pelvis and extremities and joint replacement of the hip and knee.
data.text:
Industry Relationships

HSS has a long history of supporting appropriate relationships with industry because they advance HSS's mission to provide the highest quality patient care, improve patient mobility, and enhance the quality of life for all, and to advance the science of orthopedic surgery, rheumatology, and their related disciplines through research and education.

As of May 11, 2024, Dr. Grose reported no relationships with the healthcare industry.

HSS and its physicians make this information available to patients and the public, thus creating a transparent environment for those who are interested in this information. Further, the HSS Conflicts of Interest and Commitment Policy prohibits physicians from collecting royalties on products they develop that are used on patients at HSS.
